/api/users
resources.description:
**Summary:** Get the list of users.

**Response Example:**
```json 
{
  "/api/users": {
    "content": [
      {
        "administrator": 1,
        "avatar": null,
        "createdon": "Thu, 23 Sep 2021 12:08:42 GMT",
        "email": "admin@sam.pt",
        "firstName": "Administrator",
        "id": 1,
        "lastName": null,
        "updatedon": "Thu, 23 Sep 2021 12:08:42 GMT",
        "user_status": 1
      },
      {
        "administrator": 0,
        "avatar": null,
        "createdon": "Thu, 23 Sep 2021 12:08:42 GMT",
        "email": "forrest@sam.pt",
        "firstName": "Forrest",
        "id": 2,
        "lastName": "Gump",
        "updatedon": "Thu, 23 Sep 2021 12:08:42 GMT",
        "user_status": 1
      }
    ],
    "status": 200
  }
}
```

resources.name: /api/user/{email}
resources.description:
**Summary:** Get a user by ```email```.

**Response Example:**
```json 
{
  "/api/user/forrest@sam.pt": {
    "avatar": null,
    "email": "forrest@sam.pt",
    "firstName": "Forrest",
    "id": 2,
    "lastName": "Gump",
    "status": 200
  }
}
```

resources.name: /api/user
/api/user/{email}
resources.description:
**Summary:** Update a user by ```email```.

**body / Example Value: **
```json
{
	"email": "test_updated@user.com",
	"psw": "1234",
	"firstname": "First Name Updated",
	"lastname": "Last Name Updated",
	"avatar": "test_updated.png",
	"createdon": "2021-09-20 09:05:00",
	"updatedon": "2021-09-20 09:05:00"
}
```

**Response Example:**
```json 
{
  "/api/user/test@user.com": {
    "status": 200
  }
}
```

resources.name: /api/user/{email}
/api/user/login
resources.description:
**Summary:** Authenticate user with an email and password. The authentication process returns a bearer JWT used to grant users access to SAM's Web services.

**Response Example:**
```json 
{
  "/api/user/login": {
    "avatar": null,
    "email": "admin@sam.pt",
    "exp": 1632577038,
    "id": 1,
    "is_admin": 1,
    "status": 200,
    "token": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpZCI6MSwiZW1haWwiOiJhZG1pbkBzYW0ucHQiLCJhdmF0YXIiOm51bGwsImlzX2FkbWluIjoxLCJleHAiOjE2MzI1NzcwMzh9.S6H3qVJfDccehbcPCtqzqqu9FDBxt6G1Nj2582bQnDA"
  }
}
```

resources.name: /api/user/logout
resources.description: **Summary:** Logout user with his/her JWT.

resources.description:
**Summary:** Get the list of modules installed in the platform.

**Response Example:**
```json 
{
  "/api/modules": {
    "content": [
      {
        "avatar": null,
        "createdon": "Tue, 28 Sep 2021 13:42:48 GMT",
        "description": null,
        "displayname": "Security Requirements",
        "fullname": "Security Requirements Elicitation",
        "id": 1,
        "logic_filename": null,
        "plugin": true,
        "shortname": "SRE",
        "type_id": null,
        "updatedon": "Tue, 28 Sep 2021 13:48:19 GMT"
      }
    ],
    "status": 200
  }
}
```

resources.name: /api/module/{id}/tree
/api/module/{id}
resources.description:
**Summary:** Find a module by module``id``.

**Response Example:**
```json 
{
  "/api/module/1": {
    "content": [
      {
        "avatar": null,
        "createdon": "Tue, 28 Sep 2021 13:54:48 GMT",
        "dependencies": [],
        "description": null,
        "displayname": "Security Requirements",
        "fullname": "Security Requirements Elicitation",
        "id": 1,
        "logic_filename": null,
        "recommendations": [
          {
            "content": "Confidentiality",
            "createdon": "Tue, 28 Sep 2021 13:54:48 GMT",
            "id": 10,
            "questions_answers": [
              {
                "answer_id": 9,
                "createdon": "Tue, 28 Sep 2021 13:54:48 GMT",
                "id": 11,
                "question_id": 27,
                "updatedon": "Tue, 28 Sep 2021 13:54:48 GMT"
              }
            ],
            "updatedon": "Tue, 28 Sep 2021 13:54:48 GMT"
          }
        ],
        "shortname": "SRE",
...
}
```

/api/sessions/user/{email}
resources.description:
**Summary:** Lists sessions of a user by user``email``.

**Response Example:**
```json 
{
  "/api/sessions/user/forrest@sam.pt": {
    "content": [
      {
        "createdOn": "Wed, 17 Nov 2021 11:53:26 GMT",
        "ended": 0,
        "id": 1,
        "module": {
          "avatar": null,
          "createdon": "Wed, 17 Nov 2021 11:41:19 GMT",
          "dependencies": [],
          "description": null,
          "displayname": "Security Requirements",
          "fullname": "Security Requirements Elicitation",
          "id": 1,
          "logic_filename": null,
          "shortname": "SRE",
          "type_id": null,
          "updatedon": "Wed, 17 Nov 2021 11:41:19 GMT"
        },
        "updatedOn": "Wed, 17 Nov 2021 11:53:26 GMT",
        "user_email": "forrest@sam.pt",
        "user_id": 2
      }
    ],
    "status": 200
  }
}
```

resources.name: /api/sessions/module/{id}/user/{id}
/api/sessions/closed
/api/dependency
/api/dependency
/api/dependencies
/api/dependencies/{id}
/api/dependency/{id}
/api/dependency/module/{id}
/dependency/module/{id}/depends/{id}
resources.description:
**Summary:** Finds a dependency of a module, taking the ``id`` of the current module and the ``id`` of the module that it depends on.

**Response Example:**
```json 
{
  "/api/dependency/module/2/depends/1": {
    "createdon": 1,
    "depends_on_module_id": 1,
    "id": 2,
    "module_id": 2,
    "status": 200,
    "updatedon": "Wed, 17 Nov 2021 14:14:26 GMT"
  }
}
```

resources.name: /api/file/{path}
resources.description: **Summary:** Returns a file from the ``external`` directory.

resources.name: /api/files
resources.description:
**Summary:** Returns the list of files available on the ``external`` directory.

**Response Example:**
```json 
[
  "example.md",
  "example_2.md"
]
```

resources.name: /api/file/{filename}
/api/file/module/{shortname}/session/{id}
resources.description: **Summary:** Download a zip containing all recommendations for a specific session``id`` and a module identified by module``shortname``.

resources.name: /api/statistic/users

/api/statistics
resources.description:
**Summary:** Get global stats of the plataform.

**Response Example:**
```json 
{
  "/api/statistics": {
    "answers": 0,
    "modules": 0,
    "questions": 0,
    "recommendations": 0,
    "sessions": 0,
    "status": 200,
    "users": 2
  }
}
```
